sourcesContent:
import React, { Component } from 'react'
import { Button, Checkbox, Form, Container } from 'semantic-ui-react'
export default class EditProduct extends Component {
    constructor(props){
        super(props);
        this.state = {
            name: 'sad',
            weight: '',
            Availability: '',
            product_url: '',
            price_tier: '',
            price_range: '',
            editable: ''
        };
        this.onChange = this.onChange.bind(this);
    }
    onChange(e){
        this.setState({[e.name]: e.value});
    }
    render() {
        return (
            <React.Fragment>
                <Container>
                <Form>
                    <Form.Field>
                    <label>Name</label>
                    <input placeholder='Name' name="name" value={this.state.name} onChange={ e => this.onChange(e.target)}/>
                    </Form.Field>
                    <Form.Field>
                    <label>Weight</label>
                    <input placeholder='Weight' />
                    </Form.Field>
                    <Form.Field>
                    <label>Availability</label>
                    <input placeholder='Availability' />
                    </Form.Field>
                    <Form.Field>
                    <label>Product URL</label>
                    <input placeholder='Product URL' />
                    </Form.Field>
                    <Form.Field>
                    <label>Price Tier</label>
                    <input placeholder='Price Tier' />
                    </Form.Field>
                    <Form.Field>
                    <label>Price Range</label>
                    <input placeholder='Price Range' />
                    </Form.Field>
                    <Form.Field>
                    <Checkbox label='Is Editable' />
                    </Form.Field>
                    <Button type='submit'>Submit</Button>
                </Form>
                </Container>
            </React.Fragment>
        )
    }
    }
